description: Demolition of existing rear extension and shed and erection of a two storey side and rear extension and single storey rear extension, landscaping and internal alterations
decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr">Details of a green roof, designed for biodiversity and as part of a sustainable urban drainage system, shall be submitted and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing prior to the occupation of the works. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.&nbsp;</p><p dir="ltr"><strong id="docs-internal-guid-99f1a82b-7fff-a2ba-183c-5d0b26b241ea">&nbsp;</strong>REASON: In the interest of enhancing biodiversity, managing flood risk and providing a sustainable drainage system together with ensuring the green roof integrates with the design of the hereby approved development.</p>

<p>All new external facing and roofing materials in respect of all the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works carried out in this connection) shall match those of the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance including type, size, colour, bond, pointing, coursing, jointing, profile and texture&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>

REASON: To protect the design character and appearance of the existing building and other buildings in the streetscene</p>
